headline.text: Seven art exhibits to see in the D.C. area this November

article1.author: Audrey Decker
article1.blurb: Growing up with an art major for a mother, I was dragged to museum after museum. While my 10-year-old self wasn’t too happy, looking back, I’ve grown to appreciate every Washington, D.C., exhibit my mom took me to.

headline.text: Essential items for your winter wardrobe

article2.author: Oyinkansola Awosika
article2.blurb: While I despise winter, I think we can all agree that there is one highlight to the approaching season: style. Winter fashion opens the door for layers, textures and fabrics that simply do not work at any other time.
